author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs a custom cherrypicking workflow from .csv file using custom filtertips. The .csv file should be formatted as follows, including header line (all empty lines are ignored):
source labware,source slot,source well,volume,destination labware,destination slot,destination well,height offset from top of source well (mm)
plate,1,A2,7,tuberack,5,A4,-4
plate,2,H10,9,tuberack,3,D1,-4
Note that source labware and destination labware must be either plate, tuberack, or deepplate.



Bio-Rad Hard-Shell® 96-Well PCR Plates 200µl #HSP9601
NEST 96 Deepwell Plate 2mL
Opentrons P20 GEN2 single-channel pipette
Biotix 96 Filter Tiprack 10µl

markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs a custom cherrypicking workflow from `.csv` file using custom filtertips. The `.csv` file should be formatted as follows, **including header line** (all empty lines are ignored):

```
source labware,source slot,source well,volume,destination labware,destination slot,destination well,height offset from top of source well (mm)
plate,1,A2,7,tuberack,5,A4,-4
plate,2,H10,9,tuberack,3,D1,-4
```

Note that `source labware` and `destination labware` must be either `plate`, `tuberack`, or `deepplate`.

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

* [Bio-Rad Hard-Shell® 96-Well PCR Plates 200µl #HSP9601](https://www.bio-rad.com/en-us/sku/hsp9601-hard-shell-96-well-pcr-plates-low-profile-thin-wall-skirted-white-clear?ID=hsp9601)
* [NEST 96 Deepwell Plate 2mL](https://labware.opentrons.com/nest_96_wellplate_2ml_deep)
* [Opentrons P20 GEN2 single-channel pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/single-channel-electronic-pipette)
* [Biotix 96 Filter Tiprack 10µl](https://biotix.com/products/utip-for-universal-pipettes/10-%ce%bcl-xl-racked-filtered-sterilized/)

---
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
markdown.process:
1. Upload your `.csv` file and input the mount side for your P20 GEN2 single-channel pipette.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.title: Cherrypicking from .csv

notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.
process:
Upload your .csv file and input the mount side for your P20 GEN2 single-channel pipette.
Download your protocol.

Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.

title: Cherrypicking from .csv
